How to: thinkpad_acpi and fan control on Arch

January 19, 2012

From the "this might help some random person" department - setting up manual Thinkpad fan control in Arch Linux. Edit /etc/rc.conf. Add thinkpad_acpi to MODULES=() in the hardware section. Create a new file enabling fan control as /etc/modprobe.d/thinkfan.conf: options thinkpad_acpi…
